item.title: COBR starts paying dividends
item.description: Cobra Electronics (COBR) annouced quarterly results on Thursday. Revenue was up a little. Net income was up a lot, but mostly due to one time events. The market wasn’t impressed and the stock fell 8%. Day to day price changes don’t worry me, so that’s not what I’m writing about. I mentioned back in July that I was concerned about the cash hoard that Cobra was amassing. Specifically I said:
